title: The Testarossa Story - /DRIVEN
description:
John Pogson is one of the most important people in the world of Ferrari. He's been fixing them and driving them since his early 20s. When it comes to restoration and race engineering, he's simply one of the best.


In this episode of /DRIVEN, John tells the story of the legend: the Testarossa.
tags: Ferrari Testarossa, John Pogson, Ferrari history, 512TR

John Pogson is one of the most important people in the world of Ferrari. He's been fixing them and driving them since his early 20s. When it comes to restoration and race engineering, he's simply one of the best.
